title: Files Necessary To Install 'East Asian Languages' 14/12/08
description:
- : Files Necessary To Install 'East Asian Languages' On Win XP Home/Pro : -

Release Date: 

   14/12/2008

Package Info:

These files are necessary to install the following supplemental languages on Win XP Home/Pro:    
  - Japanese
  - Korean
  - Chinese    

Package Comments:

~ The files Under the I386 and I386/LANG folders are the original files from a Win XP installation CD.

~ I did not temper with any of the files nor added any unnecessary programs/files.

~ All the files are necessary to install the East Asian Languages.

Package Update:

+ The following files have been added as promised for all those people who posted missing files.

        ~ I386  CGA40WOA.FO_
        ~ I386  KBDNEC.DLL
        ~ I386  SMALLF.FO_
        ~ I386  COURE.FO_
        ~ I386  COURF.FO_

The-Duck's General Comments:

-This Package is basically a stripped Win XP installation to install only the East Asian Languages.

- Only tested on XP Home/Pro SP2 (shouldn't have any problems with other SPs though...).

- The language installation process can be aborted at anytime if a file appears to be missing, aborting won't cause any harm to your computer.

- If you have any missing files, post their names at ThePirateBay [http://www.thepiratebay.se/] as a comment under this torrent and ill update the torrent with the missing files.
You can find the torrent here: http://thepiratebay.se/user/The-Duck

- If you don't know what are the Supplemental Languages for East Asian Languages on Win XP, then you probably don't need these files.
